cards.name: Baloo - Friend and Guardian
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

cards.name: Gaston - Frightful Bully
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
TOP THAT! Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, chosen opposing character can't challenge and must quest if able during their next turn.

cards.name: Rapunzel - Ready for Adventure
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
ACT OF KINDNESS Whenever one of your characters is chosen for Support, until the start of your next turn, the next time they would be dealt damage they take no damage instead.

cards.name: Headless Manhorse - Manny
cards.cardText: Manny was looking to get ahead, but he'd never considered that something in the Inkwell Caverns was looking for him.

cards.name: Higgins - Undercover Officer
cards.cardText: The paper trail led me to this bench, in this park. I'll have to keep an eye peeled for my quarry. The Littering Loiterer won't give me the slip this time!

cards.name: Rajah - Devoted Protector
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

He's determined to protect his friends, no matter what forms they take.

cards.name: Eilonwy - Princess of Llyr
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"If you want to come with me, you may."

cards.name: Scrooge McDuck - On the Right Track
cards.cardText:
FABULOUS WEALTH When you play this character, chosen character with a card under them gets +1 {L} this turn.

"Curse me kilts, have I missed trouble!"

cards.name: Webby Vanderquack - Knowledge Seeker
cards.cardText:
I'VE READ ABOUT THIS While you have a character or location in play with a card under them, this character gets +1 {L}.

"If I'm correct, and I know I am, these are the plants from chapter 6 of Hana's Herborium."

cards.name: Gurgi - Apple Lover
cards.cardText:
HAPPY DAY When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

In its reflection he could see the future: Moments from now, they'd be less hungry.

cards.name: Mrs. Beakley - Former S.H.U.S.H. Agent
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Initiator of the STOP protocol: Strategic Termination of Progression.

cards.name: Bagheera - Cautious Explorer
cards.cardText: He had seen many strange things in the Mysterious Ruins, but the glowing river was the most concerning. It looked and moved like water but somehow felt... different.

cards.name: Shanti - Village Girl
cards.cardText:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)

Her song winds through the forest, the gentle melody soothing the hearts of all who hear it.

cards.name: Flash - Records Specialist
cards.cardText:
HOLD... YOUR HORSES This character enters play exerted.
DEEP RESEARCH Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen Detective character +2 {S} this turn.

cards.name: Taran - Pig Keeper
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
FOLLOW THE PIG Whenever this character quests, you may return a character card named Hen Wen from your discard to your hand.

cards.name: Sebastian - Loyal Crab
cards.cardText: "A fine mess you've gotten yourself into this time, Sebastian. If the Sea King finds out something's wrong with Ariel before we find a way to fix it, you really will be in hot water!"

cards.name: Ariel - Ethereal Voice
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
COMMAND PERFORMANCE Once during your turn, whenever you play a song, if there's a card under this character, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Scrooge McDuck - Cavern Prospector
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Scrooge McDuck.)
SPECULATION Whenever you play a character or location with Boost, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under them.

cards.name: Mowgli - Man Cub
cards.cardText:
HAVE A BETTER LOOK When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of their choice.

This place is just a different kind of jungle.

cards.name: Simba - King in the Making
cards.cardText:
Boost 3 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
TIMELY ALLIANCE Whenever you put a card under this character, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Goofy - Ghost Hunter
cards.cardText:
PERFECT TRAP When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

"If you wanna beat a ghost, you gotta think like a ghost."

cards.name: Della Duck - Returning Mother
cards.cardText:
HERE TO HELP When you play this character, you may ready chosen character with Boost. If you do, they can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

"I promise I'm coming home, somehow. Nothing can stop Della Duck!"

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Amber Champion
cards.cardText:
LEADING THE WAY Your other Amber characters get +2 {W}.
FRIENDLY CHORUS While you have 2 or more other Amber characters in play, this character gains Singer 8. (They count as cost 8 to sing songs.)

cards.name: Goofy - Galumphing Gumshoe
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 {I} (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Goofy.)
HOT PURSUIT When you play this character and whenever he quests, each opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Gazelle - Ballad Singer
cards.cardText:
Singer 7 (This character counts as cost 7 to sing songs.)
CROWD FAVORITE When you play this character, you may put a song card from your discard on the top of your deck.

cards.name: Search for Clues
cards.cardText:
The player or players with the most cards in their hands choose and discard 2 cards. If you have a Detective character in play, gain 1 lore.

Judy: "Wait, are these lorebook pages?"
Nick: "Looks like it, Carrots. Maybe that's where the whispers come from!"

cards.name: Or Rewrite History!
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return a character card from your discard to your hand.

Every day they're out there making
DuckTales! Woo-oo!

cards.name: Della's Moon Lullaby
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen opposing character gets -2 {S} until the start of your next turn. Draw a card.

Life is strange and vast

cards.name: The Horseman Strikes!
cards.cardText:
Draw a card. You may banish chosen character with Evasive.

Just when you thought you'd escaped...

cards.name: Recovered Page
cards.cardText:
WHAT IS TO COME When you play this item, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
WHISPERED POWER 1 {I}, Banish this item — Put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.

cards.name: Webby's Diary
cards.cardText:
LATEST ENTRY Whenever you put a card under one of your characters or locations, you may pay 1 {I} to draw a card.

"A girl needs a place to put her innermost thoughts and feelings—not to mention trap designs!" —Webby

cards.name: The Black Cauldron
cards.cardText:
THE CAULDRON CALLS {E}, 1 {I} — Put a character card from your discard under this item faceup.
RISE AND JOIN ME! {E}, 1 {I} – This turn, you may play characters from under this item.

cards.name: Munchings and Crunchings
cards.cardText:
WHAT A JUICY APPLE {E} — Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
COME ON OUT You pay 1 {I} less to play characters named Gurgi.

cards.name: Duckburg - Funso's Funzone
cards.cardText: WHERE FUN IS IN THE ZONE Whenever a character quests while here, you pay 2 less for the next character you play this turn.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Amethyst Champion
cards.cardText: MYSTICAL BALANCE Whenever one of your other Amethyst characters is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

cards.name: The Horned King - Wicked Ruler
cards.cardText:
Shift 2 {I} (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Horned King.)
ARISE! Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand, then choose and discard a card.

cards.name: Gwythaint - Savage Hunter
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SWOOPING STRIKE Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters.

cards.name: The Horned King - Heartless Devil
cards.cardText:
"Untried courage is no match for his evil."
—Dallben

cards.name: Cauldron Born - Mindless Horde
cards.cardText:
"My beloved warriors have come to life! All the dead of centuries past! Never has anyone created an army like this!"
—The Horned King

cards.name: Demona - Betrayer of the Clan
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: Magica De Spell - Shadowy and Sinister
cards.cardText:
DARK INCANTATION When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from chosen player's discard into their deck.

"My power is still not enough. I need something more. Something... shadowy."

cards.name: Lena Sabrewing - Mysterious Duck
cards.cardText:
ARCANE CONNECTION When you play this character, if you have a character or location in play with a card under them, gain 1 lore.

"This is a strange kind of magic. These 'whispers' seem independent, but they're still incomplete."

cards.name: Iago - Stompin' Mad
cards.cardText:
Challenger +5 (While challenging, this character gets +5 {S}.)

That does it—now I'm really ticked off!

cards.name: Violet Sabrewing - Senior Junior Woodchuck
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

At last, an opportunity to earn my Mysterious Ruins Exploration badge!

cards.name: Elsa - Exploring the Unknown
cards.cardText:
CLOSER LOOK When you play this character, you may draw a card.

"This world still has secrets to uncover."

cards.name: Mushu - Braggin' Dragon
cards.cardText: "I'm the scariest thing in this forest. That pumpkin head should be scared of me!"

cards.name: Duckworth - Ghost Butler
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
FINAL ACT During your turn, when this character is banished, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.

cards.name: Nibs - Lost Boy
cards.cardText:
LOOK WHO'S BACK When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.

"That was fun! Let's do it again!"

cards.name: The Horned King - Triumphant Ghoul
cards.cardText:
GRAND MACHINATIONS During your turn, if 1 or more cards have left a player's discard this turn, this character gets +2 {L}.

"Only moments away from victory."

cards.name: Creeper - Loyal Lackey
cards.cardText: "Yes! Things are going exactly as sire planned. Soon the cauldron will be ours—I mean his."

cards.name: Coldstone - Reincarnated Cyborg
cards.cardText:
THE CANTRIPS HAVE BEEN SPOKEN When you play this character, if you have 2 or more Gargoyle character cards in your discard, gain 2 lore.

"It's alive! Alive! I've always wanted to say that." —Xanatos

cards.name: Magica De Spell - Spiteful Sorceress
cards.cardText:
MYSTICAL MANIPULATION Whenever you put a card under one of your characters or locations, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

"I am the stuff of nightmares lurking in the hidden recesses of your mind!"

cards.name: Nana - Canine Caregiver
cards.cardText: HELPFUL INSTINCTS When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to return chosen character with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

cards.name: Magica De Spell - Conniving Sorceress
cards.cardText:
Shift 7 {I} (You may pay 7 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.)
SHADOW'S GRASP When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Demona - Scourge of the Wyvern Clan
cards.cardText:
AD SAXUM COMMUTATE When you play this character, exert all opposing characters. Then, each player with fewer than 3 cards in their hand draws until they have 3.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: Hades - Looking for a Deal
cards.cardText:
WHAT D'YA SAY? When you play this character, you may choose an opposing character. If you do, draw 2 cards unless that character’s player puts that card on the bottom of their deck.

"I'm kind of on a schedule here—I got plans for August."

cards.name: Olaf - Helping Hand
cards.cardText:
SECOND CHANCE When this character leaves play, you may return chosen character of yours to your hand.

"Here, hold this while I get help. Try not to go anywhere."

cards.name: Merlin - Completing His Research
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
LEGACY OF LEARNING When this character is banished in a challenge, if he had a card under him, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Ursula - Whisper of Vanessa
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
SLIPPERY SPELL While there's a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.name: Cheshire Cat - Inexplicable
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
IT'S LOADS OF FUN Whenever you put a card under this character, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.name: Begone!
cards.cardText:
Return chosen character, item, or location with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

"Alakazam, alakazook, send this page back to its book!"

cards.name: Can't Hold It Back Anymore
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Exert chosen opposing character. Move all damage counters from all other characters to that character.

cards.name: Swooping Strike
cards.cardText:
Each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters.

You could try to run...

cards.name: Performance Review
cards.cardText:
{E} chosen ready character of yours to draw cards equal to that character’s {L}.

"Listen, fellas, it's a real 'what have you done for me lately' business. So give me something to work with here!"

cards.name: Fragile as a Flower
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Draw a card. Exert chosen character with cost 2 or less. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.name: Junior Woodchuck Guidebook
cards.cardText:
THE BOOK KNOWS EVERYTHING {E}, 1 {I}, Banish this item — Draw 2 cards.

"How come ghosts get a whole section, but not were-ducks?!"
—Huey

cards.name: Grimorum Arcanorum
cards.cardText:
DOCTRINA ADDUCERE During your turn, whenever an opposing character becomes exerted, gain 1 lore.
CELERITAS Your characters named Demona gain Rush. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.name: The Great Illuminary - Abandoned Laboratory
cards.cardText:
STARTLING DISCOVERY Characters gain " {E} — Draw a card" while here.

"Remember, we're looking for clues to who tore up the lorebook pages." —Elisa Maza

cards.name: Baloo - Laid-Back Bear
cards.cardText: "I tell ya, for a spooky forest, this place is all right. Plenty of berries, lots of trees for back-scratching... A bear could do a lot worse."

cards.name: Big Nose - Lovesick Poet
cards.cardText:
"Thou art pretty as a brawl
Thy hair's as dark as a moonless night
Thy cheeks the red of leaves in fall—
I love to sit and watch you fight"

cards.name: Flotsam - Slippery as an Eel
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"You're in our world now."

cards.name: Kaa - Suspicious Serpent
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

"It's bessst to play it s-ssafe."

cards.name: Webby Vanderquack - Mystery Enthusiast
cards.cardText:
CONTAGIOUS ENERGY When you play this character, chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn.

"It's happening! IT'S HAPPENING! There's a whisper nearby, and I get to see it!"

cards.name: Finnick - Tiny Terror
cards.cardText: YOU BETTER RUN When you play this character, you may pay 2 {I} to return chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less to their player's hand.

cards.name: Vladimir - Ceramic Unicorn Fan
cards.cardText:
HIGH STANDARDS Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item.

His commitment to excellent craftsmanship is unparalleled.

cards.name: Flintheart Glomgold - Scheming Billionaire
cards.cardText:
TRY ME While you have a character or location in play with a card under them, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

"Long live Glomgold! Glomgold! Glomgold!"

cards.name: Jetsam - Opportunistic Eel
cards.cardText:
AMBUSH FROM THE DEEP When you play this character, deal 3 damage to chosen opposing damaged character.

"You're coming with us."

cards.name: Hook Hand - Unexpectedly Friendly
cards.cardText: "You're a strange lookin' glimmer, ain'tcha?" he said to the whisper lingering uncertainly in the doorway. "Welcome to the Snuggly Duckling!"

cards.name: Kaa - Secretive Snake
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

It's hard to tell where the branches end and the snake begins.

cards.name: Emily Quackfaster - Level-Headed Librarian
cards.cardText:
RECOMMENDED READING When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.

"Hana's Herborium? The book that Illumineer wrote? Our only copy has been checked out, sadly."

cards.name: Flynn Rider - Spectral Scoundrel
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck face down under this character.)
I'LL TAKE THAT As long as this character has at least one card under it, it gets +2 {S} and +1 {L}.

cards.name: Bellwether - Master Manipulator
cards.cardText:
VENDETTA When this character is challenged and banished, put 1 damage counter on each opposing character.

"I will have sweet revenge!"

cards.name: Launchpad - Exceptional Pilot
cards.cardText:
OFF THE MAP When you play this character, you may banish chosen location.

"You can't spell 'crash-landed' without 'landed'!"

cards.name: Penumbra - Moon Alien
cards.cardText: "You will treat the vastly superior Moon with respect, or you will suffer the ultimate consequence."

cards.name: Baloo - Carefree Bear
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 {I} (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Baloo.)
ROLL WITH IT When you play this character, choose one:
- Each player draws a card.
- Each player chooses and discards a card.

cards.name: Megara - Secret Keeper
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
I'LL BE FINE While there's a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains "Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card."

cards.name: Goldie O'Gilt - Cunning Prospector
cards.cardText:
CLAIM JUMPER When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a location card of your choice.
STRIKE GOLD Whenever this character quests, you may put a location card from chosen player's discard on the bottom of their deck to gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Shere Khan - Fearsome Tiger
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
ON THE HUNT Whenever this character quests, banish chosen opposing damaged character. Then, you may put 1 damage counter on another chosen character.

cards.name: Scrooge McDuck - S.H.U.S.H. Agent
cards.cardText:
BACKUP PLAN When you play this character, draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
ON THE MOVE When this character is challenged, return this card to your hand. (No damage is dealt in that challenge.)

cards.name: Akela - Forest Runner
cards.cardText:
AHEAD OF THE PACK 1 {I} — This character gets +1 {S} this turn.

"Follow me, if you can," Akela said, bounding into the Bitterwood. "The hunt is on!"

cards.name: Goofy - Emerald Champion
cards.cardText:
EVEN THE SCORE Whenever one of your other Emerald characters is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.
PROVIDE COVER Your other Emerald characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.name: Little John - Impermanent Outlaw
cards.cardText:
Boost 3 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
READY TO RASSLE Whenever you put a card under this character, ready him.

cards.name: Webby Vanderquack - Junior Prospector
cards.cardText:
Shift 2 {I} (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Webby Vanderquack.)
Ward
WORK SMARTER Whenever this character quests, if an opponent has more cards in their inkwell than you, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: So Be It!
cards.cardText:
Each of your characters gets +1 {S} this turn. You may banish chosen item.

He's a patient merman—up to a point.

cards.name: Trust In Me
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Choose one:
- Each opposing character gets -1 until the start of your next turn.
- Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.

cards.name: Chomp!
cards.cardText:
Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

Mickey: "What IS that thing?!"
Goofy: "It's hungry, that's what!"

cards.name: Malicious, Mean, and Scary
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Put 1 damage counter on each opposing character.

My sneer could curdle dairy

cards.name: Potion of Malice
cards.cardText:
SUPPRESSED ANGER {E}, 1 {I} — Put 1 damage counter on chosen character.
MINDLESS RAGE {E}, Banish this item – Each opposing damaged character gains Reckless until the start of your next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.name: Inscrutable Map
cards.cardText:
BACKTRACK {E}, 1 {I} — Chosen opposing character gets -1 {L} until the start of your next turn.

Nick: "What kind of nonsense is this?"
Judy: "These symbols must mean something..."

cards.name: Enigmatic Inkcaster
cards.cardText:
ITS OWN REWARD {E} — If you've played 2 or more cards this turn, gain 1 lore.

"Whoever's room this was, I think we just found their inkcaster." —Shanzay, an Illumineer

cards.name: Blessed Bagpipes
cards.cardText:
MCDUCK HEIRLOOM When you play this item, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.
BATTLE ANTHEM Whenever one of your characters or locations with a card under them is challenged, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: White Agony Plains - Golden Lagoon
cards.cardText: PURE LIQUID GOLD This location gets +1 {L} for each character here.

cards.name: Diablo - Watchful Raven
cards.cardText:
"Be careful when gathering herbs in the Inkwell Caverns. You never know who's watching."
—Hana's Herborium

cards.name: Ares - God of War
cards.cardText: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.) CALL TO BATTLE Once during your turn, whenever you put a card under one of your characters or locations, you may ready chosen character. If you do, that character can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Peter Pan - High Flyer
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"Wanna race? Last one through the Inkwell Caverns is a codfish!"

cards.name: Tinker Bell - Fancy Footwork
cards.cardText:
"Okay, now we know pixie dust doesn't affect the torn lorebook pages. Thanks, Tink."
—Venturo, an Illumineer

cards.name: Raksha - Fearless Mother
cards.cardText:
ON PATROL Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} less to move this character to a location.

Her name means "protection," and she'll do anything to defend the cubs under her care.

cards.name: Shere Khan - Keen-Eyed Hunter
cards.cardText: "Jungle or forest, it doesn't matter. I'd recognize the scent of man anywhere."

cards.name: Rama - Vigilant Father
cards.cardText:
PROTECTION OF THE PACK Whenever you play another character with 5 {S} or more, you may ready this character. If you do, he can't quest for the rest of this turn.

With cubs to protect, any strange sound must be investigated.

cards.name: Mother Gothel - Underhanded Schemer
cards.cardText:
SOMEBODY'S GOT TO USE IT If a character was banished this turn, this character gets +2 {S}.

"The world is a cruel place, and sometimes you've got to be a little cruel to get by."

cards.name: Katrina Van Tassel - Rosy-Cheeked Lass
cards.cardText: She danced the night away, hoping to find someone who could keep up with her.

cards.name: Hermes - Harried Messenger
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

"What do you mean, 'late'? Kid, I was ahead of my time before time was invented."

cards.name: Beast - Aggressive Lord
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
THAT'S MINE Whenever he challenges another character, if there's a card under this character, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Bronx - Ferocious Beast
cards.cardText:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: Tinker Bell - Temperamental Fairy
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 {I} (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
HARMLESS DIVERSION When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less.

cards.name: David Xanatos - Charismatic Leader
cards.cardText:
LEARN FROM EVERYTHING During your turn, whenever one of your characters is banished, draw a card.
WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? Whenever this character quests, chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.name: Hans - Brazen Manipulator
cards.cardText:
JOSTLING FOR POWER King and Queen characters can't quest.
GROWING INFLUENCE At the start of your turn, if an opponent has 2 or more ready characters in play, gain 2 lore.

cards.name: Hercules - Mighty Leader
cards.cardText:
EVER VIGILANT This character can't be dealt damage unless he's being challenged.
EVER VALIANT While this character is exerted, your other Hero characters can't be dealt damage unless they're being challenged.

cards.name: Goliath - Guardian of Castle Wyvern
cards.cardText:
BE CAREFUL, ALL OF YOU Whenever one of your Gargoyle characters challenges another character, gain 1 lore.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: Brooklyn - Second in Command
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

"If they think we're beasts and monsters..."

cards.name: Donald Duck - Ruby Champion
cards.cardText:
HIGH ENERGY Your other Ruby characters get +1 {S}.
POWERFUL REWARD Your other Ruby characters with 7 {S} or more get +1 {L}.

cards.name: Elisa Maza - Intrepid Investigator
cards.cardText:
SPECIAL DETAIL While you have 2 or more other characters in play with 5 {S} or more, this character gets +2 {L}.

"Now, you can let me look the place over, or I can come back with a warrant and a lot more cops. Your call."

cards.name: Aladdin - Barreling Through
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
ONLY THE BOLD While there's a card under this character, your characters with Reckless gain "{E} — Gain 1 lore."

cards.name: Lady Tremaine - Sinister Socialite
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPEDIENT SCHEMES Whenever this character quests, if you've put a card under her this turn, you may play an action with cost 5 or less from your discard for free, then put that action card on the bottom of your deck instead of into your discard.

cards.name: The Headless Horseman - Terror of Sleepy Hollow
cards.cardText:
LEAVES NO TRACE When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less.
GATHERING STRENGTH During your turn, whenever an opposing character is banished, each of your characters gets +1 {S} this turn.

cards.name: Mulan - Standing Her Ground
cards.cardText: FLOWING BLADE During your turn, if you've put a card under one of your characters or locations this turn, this character takes no damage from challenges.

cards.name: Brom Bones - Burly Bully
cards.cardText:
ROUGH AND TUMBLE Whenever this character challenges a character with 2 {S} or less, each opponent loses 1 lore.

"Hold on, schoolmaster! That's a mighty big book. Let me take that for you!"

cards.name: Shere Khan - Fierce and Furious
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 {I} (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Shere Khan.)
WILD RAGE 1 {I}, Deal 1 damage to this character — Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Next Stop, Olympus
cards.cardText:
ACTION If you have a character with 5 {S} or more in play, you pay 2 {I} less to play this action.
Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. The next time they challenge another character this turn, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Get to Safety!
cards.cardText:
Play a location with cost 3 or less from your discard for free. Then, if you have a location named Sleepy Hollow in play, draw a card.

Run scared if you must—but whatever you do, RUN!

cards.name: Time to Go!
cards.cardText:
Banish chosen character of yours to draw 2 cards. If that character had a card under them, draw 3 cards instead.

"What are you doing here when there's a rogue horseman out there? Have you lost your head?" —Gaston

cards.name: Ghostly Tale
cards.cardText:
Exert all opposing characters with 2 {S} or less.

Brom emphasized every frightful detail, determined to scare his rival.

cards.name: Dragon Fire
cards.cardText:
Banish chosen character.

Never underestimate the wrath of a dragon.

cards.name: Mushu's Rocket
cards.cardText:
I NEED FIREPOWER When you play this item, chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
HITCH A RIDE 2 {I}, Banish this item — Chosen character gains Rush this turn.

cards.name: The Bitterwood - Underground Forest
cards.cardText: GATHER RESOURCES Once during your turn, whenever you move a character with 5 {S} or more here, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Sleepy Hollow - The Bridge
cards.cardText: HEAD FOR THE BRIDGE! Whenever a character quests while here, you may banish this location to gain 2 lore and give them Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.name: Judy Hopps - On the Case
cards.cardText:
HIDDEN CLUES When you play this character, if you have another Detective character in play, you may put chosen item into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

"More torn lorebook pages! Who could have done this?"

cards.name: Hen Wen - Prophetic Pig
cards.cardText:
FUTURE SIGHT Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

"She's a special pig, Taran."
—Dallben

cards.name: Anna - Making Snow Plans
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"Come on—there's tons to do! Skating and snow forts and sledding and hot chocolate!"

cards.name: Chef Louis - In Over His Head
cards.cardText:
"When added to a clear soup, the pale, triple-pointed leaves of Trispiritus can have a restorative effect. CAUTION: DO NOT confuse it with Three Thorns, which causes itchy rashes."
—Hana's Herborium

cards.name: Daisy Duck - Ghost Finder
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"If I'm reading this right, these aren't actually ghosts at all! Boy, you're lucky I came along on this one."

cards.name: Cri-Kee - Good Luck Charm
cards.cardText:
Alert (This character can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

"Small glimmers may feel safe in the jungle around the Mysterious Ruins, where they can easily go unnoticed." —Hana's Herborium

cards.name: Rapunzel - Creative Captor
cards.cardText:
ENSNARL When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -3 {S} this turn.

"Well, that should slow you down for a minute."

cards.name: Fergus McDuck - Scrooge's Father
cards.cardText:
TOUGHEN UP When you play this character, chosen character of yours gains Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

"Ach, close the secret entrance! You're letting all the mysterious air out!"

cards.name: Li Shang - Seasoned Strategist
cards.cardText: The sound of hoofbeats filled the air. Li Shang moved his men into position, ready to turn the tables on their pursuer.

cards.name: Genie - Investigative Mind
cards.cardText: "You know, most books are a lot more compelling when you read the pages in order..."

cards.name: Scuttle - Birdbrained
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Whoa! The wind's all of a sudden on the move here.

cards.name: Ichabod Crane - Bookish Schoolmaster
cards.cardText: WELL-READ Whenever this character quests, if you've played a character with cost 5 or more this turn, put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Jasmine - Soothing Princess
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
UPLIFTING AURA Whenever this character quests, if there’s a card under her, remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters.

cards.name: Judy Hopps - Lead Detective
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Judy Hopps.)
LATERAL THINKING During your turn, your Detective characters gain Alert and Resist +2. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.name: The Sultan - Playful Monarch
cards.cardText: Never mind what the Curator intended these trinkets for; the sultan found his own use for them soon enough.

cards.name: Ichabod Crane - Scared Out of His Mind
cards.cardText:
CHILLING TALE When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

"Every small detail in Brom's awful story returned to haunt his recollection." —Narrator

cards.name: Scar - Eerily Prepared
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST Whenever you put a card under this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {S} this turn.

cards.name: Daisy Duck - Paranormal Investigator
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Daisy Duck.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
STRANGE HAPPENINGS While this character is exerted, cards enter opponents' inkwells exerted.

cards.name: Cinderella - Dream Come True
cards.cardText: WHATEVER YOU WISH FOR At the end of your turn, if you played a Princess character this turn, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown to draw a card.

cards.name: Judy Hopps - Uncovering Clues
cards.cardText: THOROUGH INVESTIGATION When you play this character and whenever she quests, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Detective character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Pluto - Clever Cluefinder
cards.cardText:
ON THE TRAIL {E} — If you have a Detective character in play, return an item card from your discard to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

Every detective can use an assistant to sniff out clues.

cards.name: Daisy Duck - Sapphire Champion
cards.cardText:
STAND FAST Your other Sapphire characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
LOOK AHEAD Whenever one of your other Sapphire characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Kristoff - Mining the Ruins
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
WORTH MINING Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Detective
cards.cardText:
GET A CLUE When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

The clues all pointed toward ghosts, but he knew there was something more going on here.

cards.name: Hen Wen's Visions
cards.cardText:
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 1 on the top of your deck and the rest on the bottom in any order.

"Hen Wen, from you I do beseech Knowledge that lies beyond my reach..."
—Taran

cards.name: Promising Lead
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gets +1 {L} and gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"The books on these pages match up with those shelves. And the ley lines... The answer's right here!" —Judy Hopps

cards.name: Might Solve a Mystery
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 1 character card and up to 1 item card and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Sudden Scare
cards.cardText: Put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown. That player puts the top card of their deck into their inkwell facedown.

cards.name: Spooky Sight
cards.cardText:
Put all characters with cost 3 or less into their players' inkwells facedown and exerted.

"We've got to get out of here!" —Mickey Mouse

cards.name: Detective's Badge
cards.cardText:
PROTECT AND SERVE {E}, 1 {I} — Chosen character gains Resist +1 and the Detective classification until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

"It's not just a badge. It's who we are. There's no greater honor." — Detective Judy Hopps

cards.name: Ink Amplifier
cards.cardText:
ENERGY CAPTURE Whenever an opponent draws a card during their turn, if it's the second card they've drawn this turn, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

With a crackle of energy, the strange device lit up when the glimmers entered the study.

cards.name: Fairy Godmother's Wand
cards.cardText:
ONLY TILL MIDNIGHT During your turn, whenever you put a card into your inkwell, chosen Princess character of yours gains Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

Sometimes a glimpse is all you need.

cards.name: Inkrunner
cards.cardText:
PREFLIGHT CHECK When you play this item, draw a card.
READY TO RIDE {E}, 1 {I} - Chosen character gains Alert this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

cards.name: Castle of the Horned King - Bastion of Evil
cards.cardText: INTO THE GLOOM Once during your turn, whenever a character quests while here, you may ready chosen item.

cards.name: Robin Hood - Ephemeral Archer
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPERT SHOT Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, deal 1 damage to up to 2 chosen characters.

cards.name: Donald Duck - Ghost Hunter
cards.cardText:
RAISE A RUCKUS When you play this character, chosen Detective character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)

"Let's show those rotten ghosts who's in charge! You go first."

cards.name: Goliath - Clan Leader
cards.cardText:
DUSK TO DAWN At the end of each player's turn, if they have more than 2 cards in their hand, they choose and discard cards until they have 2. If they have fewer than 2 cards in their hand, they draw until they have 2.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: The Headless Horseman - Cursed Rider
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 {I} (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Headless Horseman.)
WITCHING HOUR When you play this character, each player draws 3 cards, then discards 3 cards at random. Choose an opposing character and deal 2 damage to them for each action card discarded this way.

cards.name: Clawhauser - Donut Detective
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)

It was only a crumb, but Clawhauser knew it was a small piece of a larger mystery.

cards.name: Francine - Eyeing the Evidence
cards.cardText:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

Francine stared at the torn page, trying to take her mind off Higgins and his pursuit of the littering mastermind. Was he ready for the danger of undercover work?

cards.name: Inspector Tezuka - Resolute Officer
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

"Stand back. I'll handle this."
—Inspector Tezuka

cards.name: Nick Wilde - Sly Fox Sleuth
cards.cardText: "Okay, Nick, it's time to use those superior sleuthing skills to find a way out of this. Wait, why am I talking to myself?"

cards.name: Basil - Tenacious Mouse
cards.cardText:
HOLD YOUR GROUND Whenever you play another Detective character, this character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

"It's time to make a stand!"

cards.name: Hudson - Determined Reader
cards.cardText:
FINDING ANSWERS When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Ghost Hunter
cards.cardText:
SEARCH THE SHADOWS When you play this character, chosen Detective character gains Alert this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

It's hard to catch a ghost without going somewhere spooky.

cards.name: Black Heron - Real Bad Egg
cards.cardText: "You may have bested me before, McDuck, but not this time!"

cards.name: Lexington - Small in Stature
cards.cardText:
Alert (This character can challenge as if they had Evasive.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: David Xanatos - Steel Clan Leader
cards.cardText:
MINOR INCONVENIENCE When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to deal 2 damage to chosen character.

"A plan only fails when you don't learn from it. And my plans never fail."
—David Xanatos

cards.name: Chief Bogo - Calling the Shots
cards.cardText:
MY JURISDICTION During your turn, this character can't be dealt damage.
DEPUTIZE Your other characters gain the Detective classification.

cards.name: The Twins - Lost Boys
cards.cardText:
TWO FOR ONE When you play this character, if you have a location in play, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

"Hooray! A whole new forest to be lost in!"
"Yeah, lost in!"

cards.name: Nick Wilde - Persistent Investigator
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 {I} (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Nick Wilde.)
CASE CLOSED During your turn, whenever one of your Detective characters banishes another character in a challenge, draw a card.

cards.name: Mayor Winddancer - Actor-Turned-Politician
cards.cardText: It's the role of a lifetime, and it'll take every bit of his considerable charm and fabulous mane to get it right.

cards.name: Prince Charming - Protector of the Realm
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
PROTECTIVE PRESENCE Each turn, only one character can challenge.

cards.name: Broadway - Sturdy and Strong
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can’t ready.

cards.name: Pluto - Steel Champion
cards.cardText:
WINNER TAKE ALL During your turn, whenever one of your other Steel characters banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.
MAKE ROOM Whenever you play another Steel character, you may banish chosen item.

cards.name: Fairy Godmother - Magical Benefactor
cards.cardText:
Boost 3 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
STUNNING TRANSFORMATION Whenever you put a card under this character, you may banish chosen opposing character. If you do, their player may reveal the top card of their deck. If that card is a character or item card, they may play it for free. Otherwise, they put it on the bottom of their deck.

cards.name: Zeus - Missing His Spark
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
I NEED MORE THUNDERBOLTS! While there's a card under this character, he gets +2 {S} and +2 {W}.

cards.name: The Headless Horseman - Relentless Spirit
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

If you hear hoofbeats in the dark, don't look back.

cards.name: But I'm Much Faster
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Alert and Challenger +2 this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive. They get +2 {S} while challenging.)

cards.name: Putting It All Together
cards.cardText:
Chosen opposing character can't challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.

"Okay, so the ghostly glimmers were first seen <here>, and the trail of torn lorebook pages started in this part of the Illuminary..."
—Judy Hopps

cards.name: He Hurled His Thunderbolt
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 4 damage to chosen character. Your Deity characters gain Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)

cards.name: The Game's Afoot!
cards.cardText:
Move up to 2 of your characters to the same location for free. That location gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to it is reduced by 2.)

"We've not a moment to lose!"
—Basil

cards.name: The Robot Queen
cards.cardText:
MAJOR MALFUNCTION Whenever you play a character, you may pay 1 {I} and banish this item to deal 2 damage to chosen character.

"To our beloved Queen this gift we send,
As her 60-year reign comes to an end."
—Note delivered with the robot queen

cards.name: The Sword of Hercules
cards.cardText:
MIGHTY HIT When you play this item, banish chosen opposing Deity character.
HAND-TO-HAND During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Ingenious Device
cards.cardText:
SURPRISE PACKAGE {E}, 2 {I}, Banish this item — Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
TIME GROWS SHORT During your turn, when this item is banished, deal 3 damage to chosen character or location.

cards.name: Illuminary Tunnels - Linked Caverns
cards.cardText:
SUBTERRANEAN NETWORK While you have a character here, this location gets +1 {L} for each other location you have in play.
LOCUS While you have a character here, you pay 1 {I} less to play locations.

cards.name: Zootopia - Police Headquarters
cards.cardText: NEW INFORMATION Once during your turn, whenever you move a character here, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.name: Castle Wyvern - Above the Clouds
cards.cardText: PROTECT THIS CASTLE Characters gain Challenger +1 and Resist +1 while here. (They get +1 {S} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.name: Goofy - Ghost Hunter
cards.cardText:
PERFECT TRAP When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

"If you wanna beat a ghost, you gotta think like a ghost."

cards.name: Gaston - Frightful Bully
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
TOP THAT! Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, chosen opposing character can't challenge and must quest if able during their next turn.

cards.name: The Horseman Strikes!
cards.cardText:
Draw a card. You may banish chosen character with Evasive.

Just when you thought you'd escaped...

cards.name: Elsa - Exploring the Unknown
cards.cardText:
CLOSER LOOK When you play this character, you may draw a card.

"This world still has secrets to uncover."

cards.name: Merlin - Completing His Research
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
LEGACY OF LEARNING When this character is banished in a challenge, if he had a card under him, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: The Horned King - Triumphant Ghoul
cards.cardText:
GRAND MACHINATIONS During your turn, if 1 or more cards have left a player's discard this turn, this character gets +2 {L}.

"Only moments away from victory."

cards.name: Webby Vanderquack - Mystery Enthusiast
cards.cardText:
CONTAGIOUS ENERGY When you play this character, chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn.

"It's happening! IT'S HAPPENING! There's a whisper nearby, and I get to see it!"

cards.name: Kaa - Secretive Snake
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

It's hard to tell where the branches end and the snake begins.

cards.name: Megara - Secret Keeper
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
I’LL BE FINE While there’s a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains "Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card."

cards.name: Tinker Bell - Fancy Footwork
cards.cardText:
"Okay, now we know pixie dust doesn't affect the torn lorebook pages. Thanks, Tink."
—Venturo, an Illumineer

cards.name: Mulan - Standing Her Ground
cards.cardText: FLOWING BLADE During your turn, if you've put a card under one of your characters or locations this turn, this character takes no damage from challenges.

cards.name: Aladdin - Barreling Through
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
ONLY THE BOLD While there's a card under this character, your characters with Reckless gain " {E} — Gain 1 lore."

cards.name: Daisy Duck - Ghost Finder
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"If I'm reading this right, these aren't actually ghosts at all! Boy, you're lucky I came along on this one."

cards.name: Kristoff - Mining the Ruins
cards.cardText: Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.) WORTH MINING Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Sudden Scare
cards.cardText: Put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown. That player puts the top card of their deck into their inkwell facedown.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Ghost Hunter
cards.cardText:
SEARCH THE SHADOWS When you play this character, chosen Detective character gains Alert this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

It's hard to catch a ghost without going somewhere spooky.

cards.name: Robin Hood - Ephemeral Archer
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPERT SHOT Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, deal 1 damage to up to 2 chosen characters.

cards.name: He Hurled His Thunderbolt
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 4 damage to chosen character. Your Deity characters gain Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)

cards.name: Goofy - Galumphing Gumshoe
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 {I}
HOT PURSUIT When you play this character and whenever he quests, each opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Simba - King in the Making
cards.cardText:
Boost 3 {I}
TIMELY ALLIANCE Whenever you put a card under this character, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: The Black Cauldron
cards.cardText:
THE CAULDRON CALLS {E}, 1 {I} — Put a character card from your discard under this item faceup.
RISE AND JOIN ME! {E}, 1 {I} — This turn, you may play characters from under this item.

cards.name: The Horned King - Wicked Ruler
cards.cardText:
Shift 2 {I}
ARISE! Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand, then choose and discard a card.

cards.name: Demona - Scourge of the Wyvern Clan
cards.cardText:
AD SAXUM COMMUTATE When you play this character, exert all opposing characters. Then, each player with fewer than 3 cards in their hand draws until they have 3.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

cards.name: Can't Hold it Back Anymore
cards.cardText: Exert chosen opposing character. Move all damage counters from all other characters to that character.

cards.name: Webby Vanderquack - Junior Prospector
Baloo - Carefree Bear
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 {I}
ROLL WITH IT When you play this character, choose one:
- Each player draws a card.
- Each player chooses and discards a card.

cards.name: Malicious, Mean, and Scary
cards.cardText: Put 1 damage counter on each opposing character.

cards.name: The Headless Horseman - Terror of Sleepy Hollow
cards.cardText:
LEAVES NO TRACE When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less.
GATHERING STRENGTH During your turn, whenever an opposing character is banished, each of your characters gets +1 {S} this turn.

cards.name: Lady Tremaine - Sinister Socialite
cards.cardText:
Boost 2 {I}
EXPEDIENT SCHEMES Whenever this character quests, if you've put a card under her this turn, you may play an action with cost 5 or less from your discard for free, then put that action card on the bottom of your deck instead of into your discard.

cards.name: Next Stop, Olympus
cards.cardText:
Action If you have a character with 5 {S} or more in play, you pay 2 {I} less to play this action.
Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. The next time they challenge a character this turn, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Judy Hopps - Lead Detective
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 {I}
LATERAL THINKING During your turn, your Detective characters gain Alert and Resist +2.

cards.name: Cinderella - Dream Come True
cards.cardText: WHATEVER YOU WISH FOR At the end of your turn, if you played a Princess character this turn, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown to draw a card.

cards.name: Spooky Sight
cards.cardText: Put all characters with cost 3 or less into their players' inkwells facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Goliath - Clan Leader
cards.cardText:
DUSK TO DAWN At the end of each player's turn, if they have more than 2 cards in their hand, they choose and discard cards until they have 2. If they have fewer than 2 cards in their hand, they draw until they have 2.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can’t ready.

cards.name: Nick Wilde - Persistent Investigator
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 {I}
CASE CLOSED During your turn, whenever one of your Detective characters banishes another character in a challenge, draw a card.

cards.name: The Sword of Hercules
cards.cardText: MIGHTY HIT When you play this item, banish chosen opposing Deity character. HAND-TO-HAND During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Ariel - Ethereal Voice
cards.cardText:
Boost 1 {I}
COMMAND PERFORMANCE Once during your turn, whenever you play a song, if there's a card under this character, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Hades - Looking for a Deal
cards.cardText: WHAT D'YA SAY? When you play this character, you may choose an opposing character. If you do, draw 2 cards unless that character’s player puts that card on the bottom of their deck.
